dialog-example1.component.html:
Here is my dialog

  • Press ESC to close it
  • You can also click outside
  • or here
popover-example2.component.html:
First Name Last Name
{{person.first}} {{person.last}}
tooltip-demo-example1.component.html:
<button (click)="value = value + 1">
  Try me!
  <ng-template iwTooltip>
    Click to go from {{value}} to {{value+1}}
  </ng-template>
</button>
tooltip-demo-example2.component.html:
<button>Horizontal tooltip
  <ng-template iwTooltip [horizontal]="true">
    I show up horizontally!
  </ng-template>
</button>
tooltip-demo-example3.component.html:
<button>
  Some delay ~1s
  <ng-template iwTooltip [delay]="1000">
    Yes, you waited but it was worth it!
  </ng-template>
</button>
